mapper.select: select a.rn zbnum, a.zbid, a.luid, a.zname, a.zlevel, a.rare, a.hp, a.mp, a.atk, a.def, b.l_expnow||' / '||b.L_EXPTOP expstr, a.lsfsy, a.sfsy from (select t.l_zbid zbid, t.l_uid luid, t.vc_name zname, t.l_level zlevel, t.vc_rare rare, t.l_hp hp, t.l_mp mp, t.l_atk atk, t.l_def def , t.l_sfsy lsfsy,decode(t.l_sfsy, 1, '已使用', '') sfsy, row_number() over(partition by t.l_uid order by decode(t.vc_rare,'SSS',0,'SS',1,'S',2,'A',3,'B',4,'C',5,'D',6,7),t.l_level desc) rn from tzbFull t where t.l_uid = #{Uid}) a, tzb b where a.zbid = b.l_zbid and a.luid = b.l_uid

select a.rn zbnum, a.zbid, a.luid, a.zname, a.zlevel, a.rare, a.hp, a.mp, a.atk, a.def, b.l_expnow||' / '||b.L_EXPTOP expstr, a.lsfsy, a.sfsy from (select t.l_zbid zbid, t.l_uid luid, t.vc_name zname, t.l_level zlevel, t.vc_rare rare, t.l_hp hp, t.l_mp mp, t.l_atk atk, t.l_def def , t.l_sfsy lsfsy,decode(t.l_sfsy, 1, '已使用', '') sfsy, row_number() over(partition by t.l_uid order by decode(t.vc_rare,'SSS',0,'SS',1,'S',2,'A',3,'B',4,'C',5,'D',6,7),t.l_level desc) rn from tzbFull t where t.l_uid = #{Uid}) a,tzb b where a.zbid = b.l_zbid and a.luid = b.l_uid and a.zbid not in (select b.l_zbid from trolezb b where b.l_uid = #{Uid} and b.l_rid not in (#{rid}))
